Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the use of cool roofs on new or substantially renovated state-owned buildings
Summary: Authorizes the use of cool roofs on new construction or substantially renovated state-owned buildings; relates to establishing the state green building construction act.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public buildings law, in relation to authorizing the use of cool roofs on new or substantially renovated state-owned buildings
